title: ʻUsal-i muṣaffiʹ

description.value: Analytical study on thhe teachings of G̲h̲ulām Aḥmad, 18839?-1908, regarding the death of and second advent of Jesus Christ by the religious scholar of Ahmadiyya Anjuman Ishaat Islam, Lahore.

notes.value:
Originally publishhed vol. 1: Amritsar : Mat̤bah-i Vazīr-i Hind, 1913.

Originally publishhed vol. 2: Qādiyān : Allāh Bak̲h̲sh Stīm Pres, 1914.
